text: Lehra Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 99) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Sangrur district, Punjab state, India. == Notable politicians == A notable politician from Lehragaga constituency is Rajinder Kaur Bhattal (INC), who was the first and only female Chief minister of Punjab. She won a record of five consecutive times from Lehra constituency from 1992. == List of MLAs == Members of Punjab Legislative Assembly Lehra. {| class="wikitable" style="width:70%;" |- align="center" ! № !
